casename: Teo Eng Chuan v Nirumalan V Kanapathi Pillay (No 2)
coram: Chao Hick Tin JA; Lai Siu Chiu J; Yong Pung How CJ
counsel: Liew Teck Huat (Niru & Co) for the applicant;; Rajinder Singh and Harpal Singh (B Rao & K S Rajah) for the respondent
tags-parsed: Civil Procedure/Appeals/Leave/Whether leave to appeal required under s 34(2)(a) of the Supreme Court of Judicature Act (Cap 322, 1999 Rev Ed)/Appeal against increase of damages by $130,000/Whether amount or value of subject matter at trial is $250,000 or less
